title: minecraft forge 安装了2mods 崩溃 （mac）
author: LifeJerry
txt_content:
求助
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----// Everything's going to plan. No, really, that was supposed to happen.
Time: 15-3-10 下午7:55Description: Unexpected error
